highlights_en: Around 95% businesses shut down, among them 17% will never open again
highlights_ne: लगभग 95% व्यवसायहरू बन्द भए, ती मध्ये 17% फेरि कहिले पनि खुल्दैन

highlights_en: Around 65% of the businesses has layed off more than three quarters of employees
highlights_ne: 65% व्यवसायहरूले तीन तिहाइ कर्मचारीहरु भन्दा बढी बन्द राखेका छन्

highlights_en: Revenue generation has completely stopped for 63% of businesses
highlights_ne: धेरै जसो ब्यापारका लागि राजस्व शून्य छ

highlights_en: More than 95% businesses has implemented some sort of health and sanitation measures
More than 95% businesses has implemented some sort of saftey measures for workers
Around 70% couldn't even cover operating costs in the next six months
highlights_ne: अधिक प्रेसिंग आवश्यकताहरू जसलाई व्यवसायले रिपोर्ट गरेको रूपमा सहयोग आवश्यक पर्दछ

highlights_en: Only 8% used government recovery schemes, 54% didn't even heard about them
highlights_ne: सरकारले रिकभरी योजनाहरू शुरू गर्‍यो, तर पहुँचबाट बाहिरै रह्यो

highlights_en: Very low expectations on revenue generation
Most of the jobs will not be reopened any time soon
highlights_ne: धेरै जसो कामहरू कुनै पनि समयमा चाँडै फेरि खोल्ने छैन

highlights_en: There will still be major challenges to be solved even after the business resumes
highlights_ne: व्यापार पुन: शुरू भए पछाडि समाधान हुन अझै ठूला चुनौतीहरू छन्
